entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
